channel.title: This Week in Amateur Radio Podcast
channel.description: This Week in Amateur Radio: North America's Amateur Radio News Magazine. Podcast feeds expire after one week. Archives are available at archive.twiar.org

image.title: This Week in Amateur Radio Podcast

item.title: This Week in Amateur Radio #884 - Week of 3/21/10
item.description:
Special expanded Edition #884 of This Week in Amateur Radio, and This Week in Amateur Radio Headline News, have been released. Both are now posted and available for download at www.twiar.org. Release Date: March 21, 2010.
This edition covers editions 882, 883, and 884.
Subscribe on our site or:
FIND US NOW ON I-TUNES! --> You can also direct download through our portal for web enabled devices (PS3, Blackberry, etc) at www.kxkvi.blogspot.com.
Visit our blog at www.twiari.blogspot.com.
This Week in Amateur Radio Full Version with special features and all the latest news - Running time: appx 136 minutes.
This Week in Amateur Radio Headline News version runs 61 minutes with limited special features.
This Week in Amateur Radio is available for regular download at our web site in MP3 format.
Streaming audio is also available, as is RSS/XML subscriptions for the podcast.
Enjoy, and see you next week!
de George - W2XBS This Week in Amateur Radio
item.author: w2xbs@twiar.org (George Bowen, W2XBS)

item.title: This Week in Amateur Radio #872 - Week of 12/26/09
item.description:
** HAPPY HOLIDAYS FROM TWIAR **
Edition #872 of This Week in Amateur Radio, and This Week in Amateur Radio Headline News, have been released. Both are now posted and available for download at www.twiar.org.
This is our annual Christmas Special program.
Subscribe on our site or:
FIND US NOW ON I-TUNES! --> You can also direct download through our portal for web enabled devices (PS3, Blackberry, etc) at www.kxkvi.blogspot.com.
Visit our blog at www.twiari.blogspot.com.
This Week in Amateur Radio Full Version with special features and all the latest news, our technology guru Leo Laporte, The Random Access Christmas, and our special Christmas present to you. Running time: 120 minutes.
This Week in Amateur Radio Headline News version runs 60 minutes with limited special features.
This Week in Amateur Radio is available for regular download at our web site in MP3 format.
Streaming audio is also available, as is RSS/XML subscriptions for the podcast.
Enjoy, and see you next week!
de George - W2XBS This Week in Amateur Radio
item.author: w2xbs@twiar.org (George Bowen, W2XBS)
